**Class size & staffing:** we aim for small groups with close supervision and warm, consistent caregiving; we use a mix of whole-group and small-group time so each child gets attention.

**Approach:** play-based learning with intentional teacher guidance—supporting curiosity, language development, independence, and kindness. We emphasize routines, positive behavior support, and strong home–school communication.

If helpful, could you share a bit about what you’re looking for (e.g., your child’s age/temperament, full-day vs. half-day needs, what matters most: outdoors, structure, flexibility, language, etc.)? That will help me explain how we’d support your family specifically.
